snippet.title: dysto-wanderer / gameplay trailer ⭑.ᐟ demo out now on @Steam
snippet.description:
dysto-wanderer demo is finally live on steam and ready for you to play!

this is just the beginning: dive into the first 2 levels, solve some wild puzzles, and run through the ruins of a world that's seen better days.

it'll be available for a month, so grab your fav drink and test it out. and don't forget to wishlist if you haven't yet! your support means the world to me ♥︎

#indiegame #steamnextfest #games #puzzlegame #runninggames #escaperoom #postapocalyptic #dystopian #unrealengine #steam #gaming #gameplay #gamedemo 

credits:
drifter - ambient atmospheric song by Twotrickpony -- https://freesound.org/s/745567/ -- License: Attribution 4.0
